text: While PRP have been hearing about this kind of thing for a while now , PRP is about to become reality . A group of Harvard NNS are VBG to be working to fight NN NN in a very interesting way . DT attempts PRP will be making MD drastically VB things . Basically , PRP will be using different sprays to reflect sunlight artificially and in doing this work to reduce DT temperature . While DT idea is controversial at best if PRP works , PRP might be able to see real changes . This project is called Stratospheric Controlled Perturbation Experiment ( SCoPEx ) and will be about three million dollars right off DT bat just for testing . Through this experiment , Harvard officials hope to advance their understandings on stratospheric aerosols in general so IN PRP can be determined whether PRP are actually useful or not . PRP is thought IN these researchers will be able to reduce their levels of uncertainty and determine DT risks and benefits of solar geoengineering . If these sprays MD potentially eliminate or reduce our ozone loss in DT long run without risks , PRP might have a good solution for now . Harvard wrote as follows on DT experiment itself : At DT heart of SCoPEx is a propelled scientific balloon WDT can travel a few meters per second ( walking speed ) relative to DT surrounding air . DT propellers serve two functions . First , DT propeller wake forms a well - mixed volume ( roughly 1 km long and 100 meters in diameter ) WDT serves as an experimental ‘ beaker ’ in which PRP can add gasses or particles . Second , DT propellers allow PRP to fly DT gondola back and forth through DT volume to measure DT properties of DT perturbed air . DT advantage of DT SCoPEx propelled balloon is IN PRP allows PRP to create a small controlled volume of stratospheric air and observe its evolution for ( PRP hope ) over 24 hours . Hence DT acronym , Stratospheric Controlled Perturbation Experiment . If PRP used an aircraft instead of a balloon , PRP MD not be able to use such a small perturbed volume nor MD PRP be able to observe PRP for such long durations . SCoPEx builds on four decades of research on DT environmental chemistry of DT ozone layer in DT Anderson / Keith / Keutsch groups . SCoPEx will use or adapt JJ of DT high - performance sensors and flight - system engineering experience developed for this ozone research . Analyzing these experiments will improve our knowledge beyond what is currently available within computer models or is measurable with confidence under laboratory conditions . For this experiment , frozen NN will be released or so researchers NN . This being for now until PRP move forward and release calcium carbonate and other minerals . This whole operation is according to a release funded by DT internal Harvard research funds WDT are provided by Professor David Keith and Frank Keutsch as well as Harvard ’s Solar Geoengineering Research Program . PRP do not VB what results will be obtained through this but researchers believe PRP have a good idea of what will come . According to Forbes , DT basis around this experiment is from studying DT effects of large volcanic eruptions on DT NN ’s temperature . Because computer models can only VB so far taking this out into DT field and giving PRP a NN is DT next step . This geoengineering technique MD really VB things . DT being VBN , some studies suggest IN spraying sunlight reflective particles into DT atmosphere MD have lots of consequences and kill off crops or VB weather patterns at DT very least . To learn more about SCoPEx please feel free to click here . While this report is older , PRP is still full of a lot of information on DT experiment itself . This experiment is set to begin in 2019 as far as in DT field things VBP . What do PRP VB about all of this ?

text: A growing number of Dutch Catholic are now turning to populist politicians and parties and rejecting Pope Francis 's warnings of its dangers . Populist legislator Thierry Baudet last week “ surged into DT Dutch political mainstream as DT biggest winner in nationwide elections . " According to Katholiek Nieuwsblad , he is DT “ DT JJ face of Dutch populism , ” appealing to JJ Catholics who have felt politically homeless . Baudet is against mass migration , skeptical of NN NN , and an outspoken critic of DT “ cartel party , ” in reference to DT elite Dutch political establishment . [ RELATED ] 4.2 Million Americans Abandon DT Catholic Church In Protest Of Pope Francis Earlier this NN , Francis blamed DT shortcomings of globalization on DT rapid rise of nationalism . Francis did not highlight any specific NNS of political parties but reflected on national policies favoring " quick partisan consensus " over patient efforts for DT common good . DT Pontiff expressed worry IN Europe and North America are limiting their acceptance to migrants in his speech to diplomats accredited to DT Vatican . Three Dutch practicing Catholics were interviewed by Katholiek Nieuwsblad , who VBD PRP sympathize with Forum for Democracy - as DT newspaper describes a former member , a ‘ dormant ’ member and an active member of DT party . DT former member , Michiel Hemminga , is a philosopher and pro-life who is sympathetic to JJ of DT party ’s positions , but critical of others . According to Breitbart : Forum for Democracy suffers from a certain ambiguity in its platform , Hemminga VBD , and some of its positions are untenable for a Catholic . While their opposition to overreaching from DT European Union ( EU ) and unchecked migration is open and a viable option for Catholics , on other issues tensions cannot help but arise . “ According to CD of DT party ’s plans , at a certain point all religious NNS should agree to DT fact IN DT Dutch law is above their own religious beliefs , ” Hemminga VBD . “ For me , as a Christian , DT ’s not an option . I ’m not suddenly VBG to support gay marriage or abortion , because PRP ’s DT law . ” Erik van Goor , a Catholic convert , publicist , and blogger is an early member of Forum for Democracy , who has hopes IN DT party will be able to shake up DT current political system . “ When I understood IN a political party was in DT making , I was very enthusiastic about PRP . I do n’t VB what DT future holds for DT party , but I do VB DT current system needs a breakthrough . Geert Wilders has n’t been able to do DT , but I hope Forum for Democracy will , ” he VBD . “ NNS are becoming more and more secular and liberal , ” van Goor VBD . “ PRP run DT risk of living in a NN where PRP cannot VB or say anything WDT is opposed by DT mainstream NN . ” Forum for Democracy draws JJ NNS who worry about DT whole “ gender craze , ” he VBD , attracting JJ conservatives “ who feel abandoned by a liberal left policy . ” Another convert to Catholicism , Zlata Brouwer is a “ dormant ” member of Forum for Democracy , who appreciated DT party ’s commitment to preserving Dutch culture . “ When I received my religious education , I studied DT moral and cultural roots of our Western culture and how PRP are intertwined , ” Brouwer VBD . “ But PRP throw away our own culture . Although Forum for Democracy is not a Christian party , I believe PRP ’s DT only party who tries to preserve our culture , our democracy , for future generations , ” she VBD . Although EX are positions espoused by Baudet WDT she disagrees with , as a whole , she finds him more convincing than DT other candidates . “ I do n’t VB he ’s acknowledging DT true origin of what he likes to preserve . My hope is IN CD day he will , perhaps if he gets married and starts a family , ” she VBD . “ PRP need only to look at DT history books to realize IN DT traditional marriage and DT family are essential to all things created within a culture . ” [ RELATED ] Pope Francis Calls on Migrants to Flood DT NNP : ' Forget National Security '

text: Mass Extinction , ' Great Dying ' MD Wipe Out Life on NNP , NNPS Warn NNS are warning IN naturally occurring JJ NN was behind DT largest mass extinction event on NNP , and our NN MD be due for another huge wipeout . Researchers have shown IN DT Great Dying , which killed almost all of NNP 's ocean creatures around 250 million NNS ago , was caused by rising JJ temperates . text: A green fund is a mutual fund or another investment vehicle WDT will only invest in companies WDT are deemed socially conscious in their business dealings or directly promote environmental responsibility . A green fund can come in DT form of a focused investment vehicle for companies engaged in environmentally supportive businesses , such as alternative NN , green transport , NN and waste management , and sustainable living . A green fund 's strategy can be based on some of DT following characteristics : avoiding negative company criteria ( businesses such as guns , alcohol , gambling , pornography , animal testing , etc. ) ; choosing positive company criteria ( environmental programs , NN conservation , fair trade , etc. ) ; or a combination of both strategies . Based on performance , PRP is not yet clear whether green funds and socially responsible investing ( SRI ) can consistently create better returns for investors , but PRP do represent a proactive step toward environmental consciousness , which JJ investors see as valuable . Some have cited green investing as having begun in earnest during DT 1990s , a period where investors were more seriously taking into account DT harm businesses or DT pressure entire industries were putting on DT environment . In DT wake of headline - grabbing events IN DT Exxon Valdez oil spill , and large and protracted fights over logging rights in DT Pacific Northwest , a set of investors began to view businesses WDT were better at managing their environmental impact as more valuable than those who MD n't . These types of businesses , in some investors ' eyes , were not only operating in a more ethical manner but had a competitive advantage over companies who were ill - equipped to reduce their impact on DT environment . Still , other investors saw an ethical obligation in investing in technologies and businesses WDT were looking to build a sustainable society through renewable NN sources . Some of DT sectors where this investment has been taking place include DT renewable NN , and buildings and efficiency sector . DT renewable NN sector is a broad NN , including solar NN , wind , battery , and NN storage technologies , as well as DT materials WDT help make those technologies possible . DT buildings sector includes builders who use NN - efficient materials , making each building 's carbon footprint smaller – whether PRP 're being used for commercial , residential , or office use . Socially conscious investing has continued to gain popularity , which is due largely to increased worldwide exposure to DT issue of NN NN , as well as increased federal funding for alternative NN and other programs . Since 2007 , DT Green Transition Scoreboard , a project run by Ethical Markets NNP and DT NNP Prosperity Alliance , has tracked $ 8.1 trillion invested in DT green economy through DT end of 2016 , more than halfway to DT goal of $ 10 trillion invested by 2020 . Some of DT green mutual funds WDT are available include DT TIAA - CREF Social Choice Equity Fund ( TICRX ) ; Portfolio 21 NNP Equity Fund Class R ( PORTX ) 21 ; and DT Green Century balanced ( GCBLX ) . Money has poured into green funds as investors seek both socially responsible investments and returns from DT uptick in green technologies such as wind and solar power . Inflows into socially conscious funds quadrupled to more than $ 4.3 trillion from 2012 to 2014 , with DT number of funds growing by 28 % . Despite sometimes high fees , DT funds have RB garnered relatively solid performance . Socially responsible funds returned 8.1 % versus 8.4 % for non-socially responsible funds over DT three NNS ended March 31 , 2018 . For DT 10 NNS ended on March 31 , 2018 , DT funds turned in 8.91 % versus 9.1 % for their non-socially responsible peers .

text: Satellite Data Show Amazon Rainforest Likely Drier , More Fire - Prone This NN Huge swaths of Brazil ’s Amazon rainforest are drier than usual after a rainy season with rainfall index well below historical levels , raising concerns about a further spike in wildfires and deforestation as DT dry season approaches . Data from NASA and DT Brazilian National Institute for Space Research ( INPE ) points to stressed NN conditions : DT soil is drier , temperatures are higher , and groundwater is depleted . Peak rainy season , which runs from December to February , was among DT top 10 worst on record this NN , with just 75 % of DT season ’s usual rainfall . Last NN , wildfire and deforestation in DT Amazon hit DT highest levels in a decade . But DT flames were contained by DT rainforest ’s natural humidity after several months of intense rainfall . This NN , DT rainforest MD not be so lucky . Since taking office in January 2019 , Brazil ’s NNP Jair Bolsonaro has scaled back environmental protections and pushed to VB DT country ’s legislation to open up indigenous reserves to mining and other development activities WDT are DT main drivers of Amazon destruction . DT NN has RB cut down on environmental raids amid DT NN - CD pandemic , opening DT doors to increased deforestation , wildcat mining and land grabbing . As a result , deforestation this NN increased 51 % through March compared to DT first quarter of 2019 , according to INPE . DT deforestation figure for August 2019 to DT end of March 2020 is reportedly nearly twice DT of DT same period a NN earlier . Adding a drier NN to DT mix , experts warn , MD be lethal for DT forest , intensifying forest dieback and allowing more untouched , healthy forest to catch fire in DT long term . Although weather forecasts for DT Amazon are highly unpredictable , which MD potentially reverse DT current deficit , NN models by Brazil ’s Center for Weather Forecasting and NNP Research ( CPTEC ) show no indication of above - average precipitation in DT coming months . “ PRP are entering a drier season where rains are not [ usually ] intense enough to impact DT potential for fire and other factors related to DT dry season , ” CPTEC climatologist Diego Jatobá told Mongabay . NN shortages in DT soil right after a rainy season RB signal trouble later on in DT NN , says NASA scientist and hydrologist Matthew Rodell , who works with NASA ’s Gravity Recovery and NN Experiment Follow - On ( GRACE - FO ) satellites monitoring NN levels stored deep beneath DT NNP ’s surface . Their data are used to predict drought worldwide . Recent GRACE -FO images of South America have shown large areas of Brazil ’s Amazon and Cerrado biomes in DT deep red zone , meaning NN levels are severely impacted . “ If PRP see normal to low precipitation this NN , then EX is potential for drought , ” Rodell told Mongabay in a telephone interview . “ I MD be concerned . ” But for Ane Alencar , DT head of DT Amazon Environmental Research Institute ( IPAM ) and a specialist in rainforest wildfires , an increase in fires this NN depends far more on political decisions than NN conditions , which she expects will be within an average range . “ I have DT worst possible expectations about uncontrolled human - induced deforestation and fire ignition this NN . Spontaneous combustion does n’t exist in DT Amazon , ” she told Mongabay . A technical report by IPAM published this week RB anticipates a surge in fires caused by DT deforestation spike of 2019 , as DT modus operandi of land grabbers is to deforest CD NN then set fire DT next , in order to successfully transform forest into farmland and pastures . Drier soil conditions overlap with high deforestation rates . In northern Pará NN , home to 40 % of all deforestation in DT Brazilian Amazon last NN , early fires MD happen , NN maps show . In DT area around DT city of Santarém , which already has DT highest deforestation rates in DT Amazon , fires and land clearing MD RB spike after DT recent paving of DT BR - 163 highway WDT cuts through DT Amazon rainforest , described by Bolsonaro on Twitter as “ at DT heart of agribusiness . ” DT gradual drying of DT Amazon has concerned NNS for decades , as PRP threatens to set off a cycle of forest dieback WDT MD push DT rainforest over its tipping point , turning rainforest into degraded savanna . In recent NNS , extreme weather events IN droughts and floods have increased and published data show dry seasons getting longer and more severe . But figures on DT Amazon rainy season are JJ . According to rainfall data shared with Mongabay by CPTEC , eight of DT 10 driest rainy seasons in Brazil ’s northern region recorded since 1962 happened after DT NN 2000 . “ PRP have observed a negative trend , a significant sign of reduction in rain through DT NNS , ” CPTEC scientist Jatobá told Mongabay . Nevertheless , EX is still some hope for reversing DT current scenario . According to Nepstad , some steps are already being taken by a part of DT agribusiness sector to encourage farmers to plant trees . “ Farmers are on DT hook to plant 6 million hectares ( 14.8 million acres ) in DT next 20 NNS , but PRP often do n’t have enough money or incentives to do this . This is part of DT solution , ” he VBD .

text: Calls for an independent inquiry into what is being dubbed “ Climategate ” are growing as DT foundation for man-made JJ NN implodes following DT release of emails which prove researchers colluded to manipulate data in order to “ hide DT decline ” in JJ temperatures . DT emails were leaked at DT end of last week after hackers penetrated DT servers of DT Climatic Research Unit , which is based at DT University of East Anglia , in eastern England . DT CRU is described as CD of DT leading NN research bodies in DT NN . DT hacked documents and communications reveal how top NNS conspired to falsify data in DT face of declining JJ temperatures in order to prop up DT premise IN man-made factors are driving NN NN . Others illustrate how PRP embarked on a venomous and coordinated campaign to ostracize NN skeptics and use their influence to keep dissenting reports from appearing in peer - reviewed journals , as well as using cronyism to avoid compliance with Freedom of Information Act requests . As expected , DT establishment NN has gone into whitewash overdrive , characterizing DT emails as evidence of “ rancor ” amongst DT NN community and focusing on some of DT lesser emails while ignoring DT true significance of what has been revealed . DT author admitted to DT Associated Press IN DT e mail was genuine . In another example , researchers discuss data WDT is “ artificially adjusted to look closer to DT real temperatures ” . As Anthony Watts writes , attempts to claim e mails are “ out of context , ” as DT defense has been from CRU , cannot apply in this instance . PRP can claim an email PRP wrote NNS ago is n’t accurate saying PRP was “ taken out of context ” , but a programmer making notes in DT code does so IN he / she can document what DT code is actually doing at DT stage , so IN anyone who looks at PRP later can figure out why this function does n’t plot past 1960 . In this case , PRP is not allowing all of DT temperature data to be plotted . Growing season data ( summer months when DT JJ tree rings are formed ) past 1960 is thrown out because “ these will be artificially adjusted to look closer to DT real temperatures ” , which implies some post processing routine . Spin DT , spin PRP to DT moon if PRP VBP . I ’ll believe programmer notes over DT word of somebody who stands to gain from suggesting EX ’s nothing “ untowards ” about PRP . Either DT data tells DT story of nature or PRP does not . Data WDT has been “ artificially adjusted to look closer to DT real temperatures ” is false data , yielding a false result . Another email discusses changing temperature data to fix “ blips ” in studies so as to make them conform with expectations , which of course is DT cardinal sin of scientific research . “ NN , collusion in exaggerating NN data , possibly illegal destruction of embarrassing information , organized resistance to disclosure , manipulation of data , private admissions of flaws in their JJ claims and much more ” was revealed in DT 61 megabites of confidential files released on DT Internet for anyone to read , writes Andrew Bolt . Another email appears to celebrate DT death of NN NN skeptic John L Daly , with DT words , “ In an odd way this is cheering NN . ” In another communication , DT author expresses his fantasy to “ beat DT crap out of ” NN NN skeptics . In another exchange , researchers appear to discuss ways to discredit James Saiers of DT Geophysical Research Letters journal , by means of an academic witch hunt , because of his sympathies with NN NN skeptics . “ If PRP VBP IN Saiers is in DT greenhouse skeptics camp , then , if PRP can find documentary evidence of this , PRP MD VB through official AGU channels to VB him ousted . ” Other emails express doubt about whether DT NN is really heating up and infer IN data needs to be reinterpreted . “ DT fact is IN PRP ca n’t account for DT lack of NN at DT moment and PRP is a travesty WDT PRP can ’t . DT CERES data published in DT August BAMS 09 supplement on 2008 shows EX should be even more NN : but DT data are surely wrong . Our observing system is inadequate . ” NNS discuss trying to disguise historical data WDT contradicts DT man-made NN NN thesis , such as DT Medieval Warm Period ( MWP ) , which must be ‘ contained ’ according to CD email . Suppression of evidence is RB discussed , with NNS resolving to delete embarrassing emails . “ And , perhaps most reprehensibly , ” writes James Delingpole , a long series of communications discussing how best to squeeze dissenting NNS out of DT peer review process . How , in other words , to create a scientific NN in which anyone who disagrees with AGW can be written off as a crank , whose views do not have a scrap of authority . ” “ This was DT danger of always criticising DT skeptics for not publishing in DT “ peer - reviewed literature ” . Obviously , PRP found a solution to DT –take over a journal ! So what do PRP do about this ? I VBP PRP have to stop considering “ NNP Research ” as a legitimate peer - reviewed journal . Perhaps PRP should encourage our colleagues in DT NN research community to no longer submit to , or cite papers in , this journal . PRP MD RB need to consider what PRP tell or request of our more reasonable colleagues who currently sit on DT editorial board … What do others VB ? ” “ I will be emailing DT journal to tell them I ’m having nothing more to do with PRP until PRP rid themselves of this troublesome editor . ” “ PRP results from this journal having a number of editors . DT responsible NN for this is a well - known skeptic in NZ . He has let a few papers through by Michaels and Gray in DT past . I ’ve had words with Hans von Storch about this , but got nowhere . Another thing to discuss in Nice ! ” NNS RB “ discussed ways of dodging Freedom of Information Act requests to release temperature data , ” reports DT Daily Mail . NNS will look back on this moment as DT beginning of DT end for JJ NN alarmism and DT agenda to implement draconian measures of regulation and control along with DT levy of a JJ carbon tax . text: DT JJ strike on Friday September 20 , 2019 was DT largest demonstration for NN action in history . DT movement WDT started with Swedish teenager Greta Thunberg in August 2018 has now mobilised millions , while Extinction Rebellion and other protest groups have escalated their campaigns on streets around DT NN . From DT efforts of activists in different NNS , radical “ Green JJ Deals ” are emerging as a bold , political response to DT NN crisis . “ DT NN is waking up , ” Thunberg told NN leaders at DT recent UN NNP Action Summit . “ And NN is coming whether PRP VBP PRP or not . ” But how long DT awakening takes MD be decisive for NN this century . A report published ahead of DT summit declared IN DT impacts of NN NN are accelerating – growth rates of carbon dioxide ( CO₂ ) in DT atmosphere were nearly 20 % higher in DT 2015 - CD period than DT previous five NNS , while DT average rate of NN level rise has increased to 5 mm per NN over roughly DT same period . CD author warned IN limiting JJ temperature rise to 2 °C MD require tripling current commitments to reduce NNS . To hold temperatures at 1.5 °C above pre-industrial levels , JJ ambition MD need to increase by a factor of five . DT debate over whether NN NN is happening is over , and DT conversation about what should be done is beginning in earnest . As such , for DT past few weeks , PRP ’ve asked experts from around DT NN to describe how DT NN should respond to DT threat of NN breakdown . PRP share their insights here . DT NN of DT NNP Nowhere are DT effects of NN NN more visible than in DT Arctic – a region WDT ’s estimated to be VBG at least twice as fast as DT JJ average . Arctic NN NN reached its second - lowest extent on record in September 2019 – a mere 1.6 m square miles . A JJ report by DT Intergovernmental Panel on NNP NNP ( IPCC ) has revealed DT changes WDT are underway in DT oceans and DT NN - covered regions of DT NN , and DT message is stark . “ Glaciers and NN sheets are shrinking . JJ NN level is rising at more than twice DT rate of DT 20th century . DT ocean is NN , becoming more acidic and losing oxygen . Fifty percent of coastal wetlands have been lost over DT past 100 NNS . Species are shifting , biodiversity is declining and ecosystems are losing their integrity and function . ” NNP ’s oceans have absorbed more than 90 % of DT excess heat in DT JJ NN system , but not without repercussions . Marine heatwaves are causing coral reefs to bleach and mass die - offs of fish and other wildlife . Not only does this added ocean heat wreak havoc on marine ecosystems , but PRP is changing DT relationship between coastal communities and DT ocean . Wildlife populations are struggling to adapt to DT disruption , both in DT oceans and on land . As a result , a landmark report from an international team of biodiversity experts earlier in 2019 called for “ transformative NN ” to economies and societies to prevent up to a million species VBG extinct . Five steps to restrain NNS right now “ DT UK , Norway , Sweden and France have written a target of net - zero NNS into law , [ but ] targets are , by definition , a statement of nothing more than intent . In and of themselves , PRP do not remove a single molecule of carbon dioxide from DT atmosphere . ” Limiting JJ temperature rise to 1.5 °C means DT NN has to be at net - zero carbon NNS by 2050 . But PRP ’s cumulative NNS WDT count – if NNS leave decarbonisation until DT last minute , PRP will be too late . Rebecca Willis , a professor of NN and NN policy at Lancaster University in DT UK , outlines five measures WDT can begin to restrain NNS right now : • None Task all NN departments with a NN agenda so IN PRP ’re obligated to show how their policies will contribute to NNS cuts . • None Engage DT NN in developing NN strategies with citizens ’ assemblies and involve workers in designing policy to ensure a “ just transition ” from carbon - intensive industries IN coal mining . • None Enact “ symbolic policies ” to set DT investment NN and catalyse radical NN – ban advertising for petrol cars for instance , or allow NNS to generate and sell renewable NN at home . • None Keep all remaining fossil fuels in DT ground – ban oil and gas exploration and end DT NNP $ 5.2 trillion spent on subsidising DT fossil fuel industry each NN . • None Set aside negative emission technologies – carbon capture and storage might play a role in absorbing greenhouse gases from DT atmosphere in future , but PRP do n’t exist at a meaningful scale yet . Relying on them distracts resources from cutting NNS now . EX are technologies WDT already exist which are very good at capturing CO₂ . Plants have perfected DT process of turning carbon in DT air into solid , living material over billions of NNS . Natural NN solutions mobilise this potential by restoring forests , wetlands and other habitats . CD estimate from DT UK suggests each hectare of JJ forest can absorb DT annual carbon NNS of 90 cars . But PRP ’s not as simple as letting nature do all DT hard work , says Sebastian Leuzinger , an associate professor at DT Auckland University of Technology . DT “ right tree should be planted at DT right NN in DT right place ” : • None Tree species WDT grow fast are able to store carbon more rapidly , but slower , bigger trees will ultimately store more in DT long run . • None Non-native trees MD be better at absorbing carbon efficiently than native species , so keep an open mind to their role . • None When choosing a species to plant , trust local foresters and DT community WDT will have to live alongside and nurture them . Natural NN solutions can RB help society adapt to DT inevitable changes ahead . Zita Sebesvari , head of environmental vulnerability and ecosystem services at NNP Nations University , argues IN DT value of rewilding here is two - fold : removing DT CO₂ WDT exacerbates NN NN while mitigating its impacts . How to feed DT NN Leaving room for nature seems radical when humans currently exploit more than 70 % of DT NNP ’s NN - free surface , much of PRP to grow food . PRP ’s estimated IN a third of all greenhouse gas NNS originate with agriculture – from deforesting farmland to raising livestock WDT belch methane . Farming for meat and dairy can use up to 100 times DT land area to produce a single gram of protein compared to beans , nuts and other plant sources . Little wonder IN NNS are encouraged to eat less of PRP , and Alessandro Demaio , a fellow in JJ NN at DT University of Copenhagen , recommends a “ planetary NN diet ” which involves reducing meat intake in Western NNS by 50 % . He RB calls for : • None Recycling organic waste as fertiliser and investing in agroforestry – where trees are grown around crops to increase biodiversity . • None Breeding drought - resistant crop strains , making animal feed more nutritious and creating additives WDT can make livestock emit 30 % less methane . Sean Beer , a lecturer in agriculture at Bournemouth University , argues IN eating more local and seasonal produce MD VB some way to decarbonising agriculture . Reviving traditional food supply systems MD RB be key to guaranteeing sustainable diets for all , says Jagannath Adhikari , a sessional lecturer at DT University of NNP South Wales . In parts of DT Himalayas , DT answer to this problem is “ food forests ” . Local NNS plant useful trees and grow crops in DT woodland near their homes , and protect what grows RB naturally . PRP harvest what PRP need – mushrooms , honey , roots and edible plants – and sell any surplus at a market . Since community rights were restored to forest management here , worrying trends in deforestation and poverty have been reversed . Some politicians are now supporting policies WDT address NN NN by transforming national economies under DT umbrella of a Green NNP Deal . Spain ’s socialist party was recently reelected on a Green NNP Deal platform , for example , and , in DT UK , DT Labour Party has voted in favour of CD . DT idea was born in DT UK in 2007 , but has been gaining ground around DT NN lately , especially in DT NNP where PRP has been championed by congresswoman Alexandria Ocasio - Cortez . Although DT specifics vary , a Green NNP Deal involves large investments in clean NN sector jobs and infrastructure to decarbonise DT economy and correct inequalities through job guarantees and universal basic services such as free JJ transport and healthcare . Governments MD RB be expected to slash or eliminate DT billions PRP spend on subsidising DT cost of fossil fuels . Experts RB urge for DT inclusion of DT insurance industry in Green NNP Deal discussions . A recent report from Cambridge University emphasised DT large losses insurers will face under NN NN and warns IN PRP MD spark a JJ financial crisis . >“ If governments respond appropriately to DT urgent warning issued by DT Intergovernmental Panel on NNP NNP ( IPCC ) in October [ 2018 ] , efforts to phase out fossil fuels will have to ramp up considerably — and quickly . ” Already , EX has been a slew of lawsuits against DT largest fossil fuel companies in an effort to hold them accountable for misleading DT NN on DT risks of NN NN while selling products WDT have contributed to PRP . Litigation , thus far , has not been successful , but DT tide MD be turning . In DT NNP , more than a dozen cities , counties and NNS are seeking damages from NN companies for DT DT costs of NN NN , from retrofitting storm drains to upgrading NN walls . These lawsuits draw on litigation against tobacco companies and on scientific research WDT attributes greenhouse gas NNS to NN companies . In DT past , “ DT plaintiffs had difficulties tracing NN harms to specific NNS made by particular corporations … Scientific research has evolved dramatically since then . ” says Lisa Benjamin , from Lewis & Clark College of Law , in Portland , Oregon . For example , in Europe , a German court has agreed to hear a Peruvian farmer ’s case against DT German NN giant RWE for its role in melting DT glaciers near his hometown of Huaraz and raising DT risks of landslides and flooding . A NN found RWE was responsible for 0.47 % of historic NNS , so DT farmer is seeking 0.47 % of DT cost for his community to adapt to NN NN . As DT impacts of NN NN become more clear , Thunberg ’s not DT only NN questioning DT “ fairy tales of eternal JJ growth ” . Producing stuff consumes NN , and producing more stuff , whether PRP ’s fast fashion or smartphones , means DT ongoing and growing consumption of NN . “ This makes PRP very hard to decarbonise DT economy , ” says Simon Mair at DT University of Surrey . If PRP stopped chasing productivity growth , decarbonisation MD come easier , PRP ’d have less “ crap ” and PRP might start investing NN and human NN into good jobs WDT matter , IN teaching and nursing . DT NN is finally listening to DT experts Despite DT potentially massive implications of a 2 °C rise in JJ temperature , NN NN has remained low on DT NN agenda . Journalists and their NN organisations have largely failed to give NN VB DT attention PRP deserves and have failed to press political figures on NN issues and policies . NNS ago , NN journalists threw away DT notion of putting scientific fact and NN denier opinion on equal ground . Other NNS are finally catching up and providing analysis and verification , and improving DT scientific literacy of their audience . PRP are connecting NN NN to local stories , focusing on solutions ( instead of “ doom and gloom ” coverage ) and adjusting their language to describe DT “ NN crisis ” . These shifts in journalism MD yield more action on NN NN . Young NNS tend to avoid negative NN headlines ; PRP do n’t VB their NN coverage to present a bleak and certain future . Instead , PRP VBP stories about DT “ system NN ” necessary to create zero- carbon societies , says Julie Doyle , from DT University of Brighton . PRP ’s not IN PRP ca n’t handle DT bad NN , but IN “ PRP wanted to be involved in rethinking socioeconomic systems , and are inspired and empowered by working together . ” DT ’s why “ system NN not NN NN ” has became DT rallying cry of DT young NN strikers . Thunberg ’s journey from a lonely vigil outside DT Swedish parliament to a Nobel Peace Prize nominee at DT head of a JJ movement took just over a NN . PRP seems DT NN really is waking up , but now comes DT hard part – changing DT systems WDT fuel DT NN crisis before PRP ’s too late . Instead , growth rates of carbon dioxide were nearly 20 % higher in DT 2015 - CD period than DT previous five NNS . Click here to subscribe to our NN action newsletter . NN NN is inevitable . Our response to PRP is n’t .

text: ER Editor : PRP draw DT reader ’s attention to a piece PRP published by Prof. Claudia von Werlhof from 2 NNS ago titled DT NNP Is Not VBG Up But Drying Out ! text: DT human mind does not easily grasp DT explosive nature of exponential growth . This was demonstrated more than 40 NNS ago in a series of pioneering psychological experiments conducted in DT Netherlands by Willem Wagenaar and his colleagues . In CD NN , participants were shown a hypothetical index of air pollution beginning in 1970 at a low value of 3 and rising yearly in an exponential way to 7 , 20 , 55 and , finally , 148 by 1974 . Asked to intuitively predict DT index value for 1979 , JJ of DT respondents produced estimates at or below 10 percent of DT correct value of about 21,000 ( which can be determined from DT underlying exponential equation ) . Subsequent experiments have observed similarly dramatic underestimation of exponential growth and showed IN PRP typically results from straight - line projections based on early small increases . DT deceptive nature of exponential growth is similarly conveyed by DT riddle of a single lily pad in a pond . Suppose each member of this species reproduces once a day so IN on DT second day EX are two lily pads , on DT third day EX are four , on DT fourth day EX are eight , etc . On Day 48 , DT pond is covered completely . How long did PRP take to be covered halfway ? DT answer is 47 days . Moreover , even after 40 days of exponential growth , PRP MD barely VB DT lily pads are RB , as PRP MD cover only 1/256th ( 0.4 percent ) of DT pond at DT NN . For a period of NN , PRP can easily ignore DT steady exponential growth of lily pads — until PRP smother DT pond . With respect to DT NN , DT initial doubling of DT relatively small numbers of infected NNS and deaths evoked little concern outside NNP in January and most of February , since , for weeks , NNS around DT NN had little or no personal exposure to DT NN or its victims . But DT deceptively mild and seemingly faraway beginnings of DT current pandemic led NN officials and governments to squander JJ opportunities for early intervention . As a result , in DT past few weeks , DT numbers have quickly become a torrent overwhelming our capacity to stop DT NN ’ spread and care for DT victims . PRP took 67 days to reach 100,000 NN NNS worldwide . DT second 100,000 NNS took 11 days , and DT third 100,000 took only four days . JJ - NN authorities are now scrambling to communicate just how steep and damaging DT NN growth curve has or MD become , and urgent response is becoming DT law of DT land . Aside from DT NN pandemic , DT biggest , most destructive exponential growth processes WDT PRP must grapple with today are those associated with JJ NN NN . While PRP might be hard for humans to detect IN carbon NNS and their concentration in DT atmosphere are growing exponentially right now , DT does n’t mean PRP should rest easy . DT opposite is true . As with DT NN , PRP need to anticipate DT NN crisis and act quickly and aggressively to minimize further damages before PRP overwhelm PRP . NNS have long recognized IN carbon dioxide NNS and their resulting effects have been increasing exponentially . Figure 1 shows DT monthly average carbon dioxide concentration measured at Mauna Loa Observatory in Hawaii — DT longest record of direct measurements of CO in DT atmosphere . DT volume of CO stood at 315 parts per million ( ppm ) when first measured in 1958 ; by DT end of February 2020 , PRP had risen by 31 percent to 414 ppm .

text: Researchers at DT University of Adelaide have found IN a lake on an island off DT coast of Queensland , Australia , has been relatively untouched by changes in NN for DT past 7000 NNS , and has so far RB resisted DT impact of humans . Blue Lake , CD of DT largest lakes on North Stradbroke Island , southeast of Brisbane , has been DT focus of research examining DT lake ’s response to environmental NN over NN . Researchers studied DT lake ’s NN discharge , NN quality and comparisons of historical photos over DT past 117 NNS , as well as fossil pollen and algae to better understand its history over DT past 7500 NNS . DT results , published online in DT journal Freshwater Biology , show IN Blue Lake has remained relatively stable and resilient for millennia . “ Blue Lake is CD of those rare , beautiful lakes in Australia . PRP ’s unusual because PRP ’s more than 10 metres deep but PRP ’s so clear PRP can see to DT bottom , ” says DT lead author of DT NN , Dr Cameron Barr from DT University ’s Discipline of Geography , Environment and Population . “ PRP did n’t realize just how unique and unusual this lake is until PRP started looking at a wide range of environmental markers . “ PRP VBP IN EX have been variations in NN in DT region including North Stradbroke Island over recent decades , but during DT NN DT depth , shoreline and NN chemistry of Blue Lake has displayed little variation . “ PRP RB VBP IN DT region experienced a significant shift towards a drier NN around 4000 NNS ago . Again , Blue Lake has demonstrated little variation over this period . This is in stark contrast to other changes in DT region due to shifts in NN . “ PRP appears IN Blue Lake has been an important NN ‘ refuge ’ for DT freshwater biota of DT region , and is in DT same condition now as PRP was 7500 NNS ago . With appropriate management , DT lake MD continue relatively unchanged for hundreds , possibly thousands of NNS to come , ” Dr Barr says . Project leader and co-author Dr John Tibby , RB from DT University of Adelaide , says DT results of this research MD affect decision making about utilising DT freshwater aquifer of North Stradbroke Island as a source of fresh NN for DT mainland . “ Our NN suggests IN increased extraction of ground NN represents CD of DT few obvious threats to DT stability of Blue Lake . DT threat this MD pose to DT lake ’s status as a stable freshwater refuge needs serious consideration if DT regional aquifer of North Stradbroke Island is to be contemplated , ” Dr Tibby says . Wikimedia Commons Blue Lake on North Stadbroke Island in Australia has been untouched by man or NN NN for DT past 7,500 NNS , NNS say . DT ISLAND THAT’S CD OF NN ’S MOST IMPORTANT WETLANDS North Stradbroke Island lies 18 miles off DT coast of Brisbane – and its lakes are classed as CD of DT NN ’s most ecologically important wetlands . As well as Blue Lake , DT waterways include Brown Lake , DT Keyholes , Eighteen Mile Swamp and some small lagoons . DT Aboriginal name for Blue Lake National Park is ‘ Kaboora ’ , which means ‘ silent pool ’ . A haven for wildlife , DT area attracts forest birds , goannas ( a type of monitor lizard ) and other reptiles . Blue Lake is RB home to soft - spined sunfish . DT lake is not accessible by car , and DT nearest car park is 1.5 miles away .

text: This article addresses DT concept of climatic variation and NN within DT set of integrated natural features and processes known as DT NNP system . DT nature of DT evidence for NN NN is explained , as are DT principal mechanisms WDT have caused NN NN throughout DT history of NNP . Finally , a detailed description is given of NN NN over JJ different timescales , ranging from a typical human life span to all of geologic NN . For a detailed description of DT development of NNP ’s atmosphere , see DT article atmosphere , evolution of . For full treatment of DT most critical issue of NN NN in DT contemporary NN , see JJ NN . NN is often defined loosely as DT average weather at a particular place , incorporating such features as temperature , precipitation , humidity , and windiness . A more specific definition MD VB IN NN is DT mean NN and variability of these features over some extended NN period . Both definitions acknowledge IN DT weather is always changing , owing to instabilities in DT atmosphere . And as weather varies from day to day , so too does NN vary , from daily day - and - night cycles up to periods of geologic NN hundreds of millions of NNS long . In a very real sense , NN variation is a redundant expression — NN is always varying . No two NNS are exactly alike , nor are any two decades , any two centuries , or any two millennia . DT atmosphere is a dynamic fluid WDT is continually in motion . Both its physical properties and its rate and direction of motion are influenced by a variety of factors , including solar radiation , DT geographic position of continents , ocean currents , DT location and orientation of mountain ranges , atmospheric chemistry , and vegetation growing on DT land surface . All these factors VBP through NN . Some factors , such as DT distribution of heat within DT oceans , atmospheric chemistry , and surface vegetation , VB at very short timescales . Others , such as DT position of continents and DT location and height of mountain ranges , VBP over very long timescales . Therefore , NN , which results from DT physical properties and motion of DT atmosphere , varies at every conceivable timescale . A series of photographs of DT Grinnell Glacier taken from DT summit of Mount Gould in Glacier National Park , Montana , in 1938 , 1981 , 1998 , and 2006 ( from left to right ) . In 1938 DT Grinnell Glacier filled DT entire area at DT bottom of DT image . By 2006 PRP had largely disappeared from this view . NN NN , periodic modification of NNP ’s NN brought about as a result of changes in DT atmosphere as well as interactions between DT atmosphere and various other geologic , chemical , biological , and geographic factors within DT NNP system . DT atmosphere is influenced by and linked to other features of NNP , including oceans , NN masses ( glaciers and NN NN ) , land surfaces , and vegetation . Together , PRP make up an integrated NNP system , in which all components interact with and influence CD another in often complex ways . For instance , NN influences DT distribution of vegetation on NNP ’s surface ( e.g. , deserts exist in arid regions , forests in humid regions ) , but vegetation in turn influences NN by reflecting radiant NN back into DT atmosphere , transferring NN ( and latent heat ) from soil to DT atmosphere , and influencing DT horizontal movement of air across DT land surface . • None iceberg Tourist boat in front of a massive iceberg near DT coast of Greenland . • None Turkmenistan Drought - resistant plants grow in DT Repetek Preserve in DT southeastern Karakum Desert , Turkmenistan . NNP NNS and atmospheric NNS are still seeking a full understanding of DT complex feedbacks and interactions among DT various components of DT NNP system . This effort is being facilitated by DT development of an interdisciplinary NN called NNP system NN . NN system NN is composed of a wide range of disciplines , including climatology ( DT NN of DT atmosphere ) , geology ( DT NN of NNP ’s surface and underground processes ) , ecology ( DT NN of how NNP ’s organisms relate to CD another and their environment ) , oceanography ( DT NN of NNP ’s oceans ) , glaciology ( DT NN of NNP ’s NN masses ) , and even DT social sciences ( DT NN of human behaviour in its social and cultural aspects ) . A full understanding of DT NNP system requires knowledge of how DT system and its components have changed through NN . DT pursuit of this understanding has led to development of NNP system history , an interdisciplinary NN WDT includes not only DT contributions of NNP system NNS but RB paleontologists ( who VBP DT life of past geologic periods ) , paleoclimatologists ( who VBP past climates ) , paleoecologists ( who VBP past environments and ecosystems ) , paleoceanographers ( who VBP DT history of DT oceans ) , and other NNS concerned with NNP history . Because different components of DT NNP system VBP at different rates and are relevant at different timescales , NNP system history is a diverse and complex NN . Students of NNP system history are not just concerned with documenting what has happened ; PRP RB view DT past as a series of experiments in which solar radiation , ocean currents , continental configurations , atmospheric chemistry , and other important features have varied . These experiments provide opportunities to learn DT relative influences of and interactions between various components of DT NNP system . Studies of NNP system history RB specify DT full array of NNS DT system has experienced in DT past and those DT system is capable of experiencing in DT future . Undoubtedly , NNS have always been aware of climatic variation at DT relatively short timescales of seasons , NNS , and decades . Biblical scripture and other early documents refer to droughts , floods , periods of severe cold , and other climatic events . Nevertheless , a full appreciation of DT nature and magnitude of climatic NN did not come about until DT late 18th and early 19th centuries , a NN when DT widespread recognition of DT deep antiquity of NNP occurred . Naturalists of this NN , including Scottish geologist Charles Lyell , Swiss - born naturalist and geologist Louis Agassiz , English naturalist Charles Darwin , American botanist Asa Gray , and Welsh naturalist Alfred Russel Wallace , came to recognize geologic and biogeographic evidence WDT made sense only in DT light of past climates radically different from those prevailing today . Geologists and paleontologists in DT 19th and early 20th centuries uncovered evidence of massive climatic changes taking place before DT Pleistocene — WDT is , before some 2.6 million NNS ago . For example , red beds indicated aridity in regions WDT are now humid ( e.g. , England and NNP England ) , whereas fossils of coal - swamp plants and reef corals indicated IN tropical climates once occurred at present - day high latitudes in both Europe and North America . Since DT late 20th century DT development of advanced technologies for dating rocks , together with geochemical techniques and other analytical tools , have revolutionized DT understanding of early NNP system history . DT occurrence of multiple epochs in recent NNP history during which continental glaciers , developed at high latitudes , penetrated into northern Europe and eastern North America was recognized by NNS by DT late 19th century . Scottish geologist James Croll proposed IN recurring variations in orbital eccentricity ( DT deviation of NNP ’s orbit from a perfectly circular path ) were responsible for alternating glacial and interglacial periods . Croll ’s controversial idea was taken up by Serbian mathematician and astronomer Milutin Milankovitch in DT early 20th century . Milankovitch proposed IN DT mechanism WDT brought about periods of glaciation was driven by cyclic changes in eccentricity as well as two other orbital parameters : precession ( a NN in DT directional focus of NNP ’s axis of rotation ) and axial tilt ( a NN in DT inclination of NNP ’s axis with respect to DT plane of its orbit around DT Sun ) . Orbital variation is now recognized as an important driver of climatic variation throughout NNP ’s history ( see below Orbital [ Milankovitch ] variations ) .

text: A recent NPR broadcast documents DT unveiling of DT depopulation / taxation scheme as envisioned by Travis Rieder , a “ philosopher ” with DT Berman Institute of Bioethics at Johns Hopkins University , who claims IN not having NNS is a “ moral duty . ” Now , DT JJ elitists are beginning to publicly play their hand by introducing DT concept of taxing childbirth . In short , PRP have disguised their JJ depopulation scheme as being a necessary action in DT effort to fight NN NN . “ Here ’s a provocative thought : Maybe PRP should protect our kids by not having them , ” says Rieder . Provocative indeed , but DT scheme ( at least in its first stage ) is being candy - coated to make PRP sound more palatable to DT average citizen . DT depopulation birth tax MD apply more heavily to DT rich , while encouraging DT poor to use more birth control , according to Rieder and his colleagues , who say IN DT plan will not be as “ abusive ” as NNP ’s CD - child policy . “ PRP aims to persuade NNS to choose fewer NNS with a strategy WDT boils down to carrots for DT poor , sticks for DT rich . “ Ethically , Rieder says poor nations VBP some slack because PRP ’re still developing , and because their per capita NNS are a sliver of DT developed NN ’s . Rieder claims IN by reducing worldwide childbirth rates by “ half a child per woman , ” carbon NNS MD be reduced by as much as CD - quarter of DT amount needed to avoid DT “ tipping point ” WDT will lead to 4 degrees Celsius JJ NN by DT end of DT century – a level of NN WDT will ostensibly make DT NN “ largely uninhabitable for humans . ” His plan has created plenty of controversy already ; Rieder receives “ nasty comments ” online , and has raised DT ire of NN NN skeptics such as Marc Morano of NNP Depot . “ DT warmists have now graduated from regulating our light bulbs , coal plants and SUVs to regulating our family size , ” VBD Morano . “ Let ’s keep ‘ JJ NN ’ out of DT bedroom ! ” As radical as Rieder ’s proposals MD sound , EX are those among DT NN NN activists who are calling for even more drastic measures . According to DT Sierra Club : “ Childbearing [ should be ] a punishable crime against society , unless DT parents hold a NN license . ” Even more extreme is DT stance of DT Voluntary Human Extinction Movement , whose members maintain IN “ voluntary human extinction is DT humanitarian alternative to human disasters , ” and IN humans should commit “ species suicide ” to save DT environment . text: On DT lakefront campus of DT University of Wisconsin in Madison , which in 60 NNS MD have average temperatures resembling those felt currently in Kansas City nearly 500 miles to its south , DT next wave of aspiring doctors settles in for a “ NN NN and Medicine ” elective filled to capacity . Students at Wisconsin learn under Dr. Jonathan Patz , who had already been consulting for DT NNP Nations on accelerating man-made NN NN ’s NN impacts decades ago . DT students examine , for instance , heat - related mortality , as well as DT healthy “ upside ” of adapting to DT effects of NN NN . Reducing PRP ’s reliance on cars and eating smarter benefits DT human body and Mother NNP alike , Patz argues . Wisconsin is just CD of roughly two dozen JJ schools leading — although only typically by offering a few courses — in DT training of physicians , nurses , pharmacists and other practitioners who will take to DT front lines of diagnosing and treating DT impact of NN NN . DT impact is showing up increasingly in emergencies , such as wildfires , and in complicated - pregnancy statistics even in developed nations . PRP is VBG to VB DT way PRP provide clinical care . For DT reason , PRP needs to be taught in every JJ school across DT nation , ” VBD Dr. Ashish Jha , DT K.T. Li Professor of NNP NNP and NNP Policy at Harvard ’s T.H. Chan School of NNP NNP , writing in DT Journal of DT American NNP Association . Columbia University ’s Mailman School of NNP NNP formed DT NNP Consortium on NNP and NNP Education in 2017 to begin to share ideas on how to train NN professionals . To date , PRP can count some 180 signatories of mostly JJ - NN programs , but RB over 20 JJ schools and another two dozen nursing programs . Even without dedicated coursework , existing classes should include more NN - NN teaching , say proponents . For instance , an asthma - diagnosing exercise with questions more closely tied to pollution exposure has now been in practice at DT University of Illinois College of Medicine at Urbana - Champaign and is driving curriculum priorities at DT University of California , San Francisco , near where deadly fires raged over DT last couple of NNS . text: DT White House laid out its policy priorities for a second NNP term yesterday , and NN NN was n’t on DT agenda . In fact , DT word “ NN ” did n’t appear at all in DT 138 - page main budget document , which asked Congress for a total of $ 4.8 trillion to fund DT NN ’s priorities across DT federal NN in fiscal 2021 . DT figure MD mean a slight increase in federal spending overall compared with DT status quo and MD enable DT NNP administration to grow DT military to include DT U.S. Space Force and to fund favorite infrastructure projects IN DT border wall . But DT agencies WDT are most responsible for addressing NN NN at home and abroad — including EPA and DT departments of NNP and NNP — MD see steep cuts under DT proposal . And programs within those agencies WDT deal directly with NN NN MD take DT biggest hit . Congress , however , is almost certain to reject DT budget blueprint as is . For CD thing , PRP violates a bipartisan agreement on spending WDT Congress reached last summer . In addition — even before Democrats gained control of DT House — Congress routinely MD override NNP ’s efforts to slash funding for NN - related items such as EPA grants to NNS and DOE ’s Advanced Research Projects Agency - NNP , a research and development program . And this NN Congress is likely to finish funding DT federal NN after November ’s presidential election . DT result likely will weigh heavily on DT appropriations process . But DT budget document does provide a sneak peek of what NNP MD VB to do with a second term , including an extension to DT 2017 tax cuts and continued efforts toward deregulation . And PRP includes his reelection pitch to voters — insomuch WDT PRP argues IN his pro-business policies have resulted in a “ blue - collar ” JJ boom WDT has benefited workers , especially those in DT NN sector . In DT budget proposal , as in last week ’s NN of DT Union address , NNP celebrated DT NNP NNPS ’ arrival as a major oil and gas producer WDT ’s set in 2020 to be a net petroleum exporter . DT shift began under NNP Obama , but NNP claimed credit for himself and his deregulatory policies . “ More jobs , lower costs , and American dominance — these are predictable results of our pro-energy policies , ” NNP wrote in his budget request . EPA , which is celebrating half a century of existence this NN , MD receive $ 6.7 billion for fiscal 2021 — a 27 % cut compared with enacted levels . PRP RB MD slash its workforce by about 11 % , to DT lowest levels since 1985 . DT administration stressed in DT budget and its supporting documents IN this NN MD return EPA to its “ core mission ” of protecting “ clean air , land and NN , and ensuring chemical safety , while targeting emerging domestic and JJ environmental challenges . ” PRP ’s unclear whether DT last part of DT line is a veiled reference to NN NN , but DT issue is n’t mentioned by name in DT EPA section of DT main budget document . In an informal summary provided by EPA , PRP appears six times — mainly in DT titles of programs slated for elimination . EPA tangled with California last NN over DT NN ’s struggle to comply with DT National Ambient Air Quality Standards . DT budget asks Congress for a total of $ 437 million for EPA ’s air quality work overall , down from DT current funding level of $ 813 million . DT includes reduced budgets for enforcement , NN and technology , and other programs . DT air and NN research program , which supports future regulations , MD lose two - thirds of its budget — a sign IN EPA under NNP is n’t contemplating JJ JJ regulatory actions . DT budget request RB MD cut funding to implement DT Montreal Protocol , a globally popular ozone treaty WDT ’s now RB phasing down hydrofluorocarbons — a powerful class of greenhouse gases used in cooling and refrigeration . While EX ’s scant mention of NN NN in EPA ’s budget , DT issue does appear in a section on “ wasteful " spending items at EPA WDT DT NNP administration has recommended for DT chopping block . DT budget again proposes moving DT NNP Star NN efficiency program — which is jointly administered by EPA and DOE — to a user - fee model WDT Congress previously has rejected . DT same section RB floated plans to zero out funding for several EPA NN NN partnership programs including DT Coalbed Methane Outreach Program , DT NNP Methane Initiative and Natural Gas STAR . “ These programs are not essential to EPA ’s core mission and can be implemented by DT private sector , ” PRP VBZ . Sean Alcorn , a legislative analyst with DT Natural Resources Defense Council , VBD DT proposal to cut full - NN EPA staff from 14,172 positions to 12,610 MD VB rid of expertise at DT agency — a move WDT MD pay dividends for NNP ’s anti-regulatory agenda even if he does n’t win in November . “ This is trying to eviscerate DT knowledge store WDT PRP have for future administrations , ” he VBD . “ PRP ’s setting EPA up to fail in future NNS . ” DT fiscal 2021 budget justification for DT NNP Department includes CD fleeting reference to NN NN as an issue , IN armed conflict and poverty , WDT is best solved through multilateral channels . But DT NNP administration again proposes steep cuts to DT top diplomatic agency of more than 21 % to $ 40.8 billion , down from $ 53 billion enacted for fiscal 2020 . DT scope of DT cuts is difficult to gauge because DT proposal eliminates some budget lines and combines others . But observers say DT result MD be deep reductions in U.S. support for multilateral and bilateral partnerships on DT environment , renewable NN , adaptation , sustainable landscapes , forestry and other issues . Capitol Hill generally has rejected those moves and seems likely to do so again . In DT last two NNS , Congress has rejected NNP administration efforts to halve support for DT JJ Environment Facility , which funds projects in developing NNS . DT NNP NNPS remains a top contributor to DT fund despite efforts by DT NNP administration to zero out funding for fiscal 2020 . “ I VBP DT message to DT vulnerable NNS WDT VBP support from DT GEF and from other funds is to pay attention to what gets into DT final appropriations bill and not what is VBN in these requests , because PRP are messaging documents , ” VBD Joe Thwaites , who follows NN finance for DT NNP Resources Institute . But funding for DT NNP Nations ’ high - profile Green NNP Fund is unlikely to be restored while NNP is in office . DT fund has been a target for GOP lawmakers who have resisted NNP ’s suggested cuts to other diplomatic budget lines . NNP ’s budget request proposes major cuts to disaster - response agencies such as DT Federal Emergency Management Agency and DT Army Corps of Engineers . But Congress previously has overridden similar proposals . A cut of $ 1.7 billion in Army Corps funding , to $ 6 billion next NN , MD reduce DT agency ’s spending on flood control — but DT is unlikely to be sustained . DT administration wants to eliminate funding “ for projects WDT are better suited to be carried out by NNS and local communities . ” But Congress has given DT Army Corps more money than administrations have requested since at least 2006 and has funneled increasing amounts in DT past three NNS as intense flooding has damaged levees , according to DT Congressional Research Service . DT administration is renewing its effort to eliminate a $ 10 million FEMA program , enacted in DT final month of DT Obama administration , WDT helps communities pay for repairs to “ high - hazard ” dams whose failure MD result in loss of life . Such projects are “ better suited to be carried out by NNS and local communities , ” DT administration says in its budget proposal . Congress repeatedly has restored DT funding . DT administration RB is trying again to cut FEMA ’s flood - mapping budget to $ 100 million from $ 263 million , saying IN mapping DT nation ’s floodplains “ is not solely a federal responsibility . ” Congress has blocked each attempted budget cut . DT administration MD find agreement with Congress in overhauling a much - maligned disaster recovery program administered by DT Department of Housing and Urban Development . Congress has given HUD $ 40 billion in emergency funding since 2017 to help communities rebuild from major disasters such as Hurricanes Harvey , Irma and Maria in 2017 . But funding has been mired in huge delays because federal law requires HUD to undertake a long and detailed rulemaking process before PRP can release DT money . Congressional leaders from both parties — as well as advocates — are looking to revamp HUD ’s disaster - recovery program so money can be allocated more quickly . DT administration says in its budget proposal IN PRP “ seeks to work with DT Congress to comprehensively reform and redesign ” DT HUD program , which PRP calls “ slow , unpredictable , and wasteful . ” DT administration wants to eliminate funding for a NASA program WDT is developing an observatory to monitor NNP to better understand NN NN . NASA ’s NNP Absolute Radiance and Refractivity Observatory MD produce “ highly accurate and trusted NN records ” WDT can help produce policies on mitigation and adaptation “ WDT address DT effects of NN NN on society , ” NASA says . DT observatory is scheduled to launch in 2023 . DT administration acknowledges DT observatory “ MD provide additional capabilities over existing satellites ” but says DT project “ is a lower priority compared to other NASA programs . ” DT administration ’s budget boosts funding for missions to land astronauts on DT moon and Mars . DT NNP Department MD see a cut of 8 % compared with 2020 enacted levels , to $ 38.5 billion . DOE ’s Advanced Research Projects Agency - NNP is again proposed for elimination , but Congress previously has shown no willingness to kill DT popular research and development program . DT Interior Department MD see its budget reduced 13 % for fiscal 2021 , to $ 12.8 billion . House Democrats have accused DT NNP administration of withholding funds from DT U.S. Geological Survey ’s NNP Adaptation NNP Centers at Interior , which operate as partnerships with universities . Rep. Betty McCollum ( D - Minn. ) , chairwoman of DT Interior and Environment Appropriations Subcommittee , pressed DT matter during testimony from USGS Director James Reilly . Reilly claimed ignorance during DT April hearing . Afterward , documents obtained through DT Freedom of Information Act showed NNP administration staffers were working to heed McCollum ’s warning . “ Congress will pay attention to DT implementation of this funding , ” according to a June meeting agenda for high - level staffers of USGS , Interior ’s assistant secretary for NN and NN , and DT Bureau of Reclamation . text: Meeting in Brussels for a two - day gathering , EU heads of NN and NN will seek to hammer out a VBN NN strategy aimed at diversifying sources while reducing pollution . In DT run-up to DT meeting , EU leaders have cranked up DT rhetoric about DT need for tough action to tackle JJ NN , although some environmentalists say IN proposed targets do not VB far enough . German Chancellor Angela Merkel , who will host European leaders for DT first NN under Germany 's EU presidency , stressed DT urgency of their task by warning IN Europe was at an " important crossroads . " " If PRP act decisively now , PRP have a chance of effectively counteracting DT dangers of NN NN , " she VBD in her invitation to DT summit . Merkel told DT British Financial Times newspaper on Wednesday IN she wanted " Europe to take a ' pioneering lead ' on meaningful green initiatives . " Merkel was seconded by former NNP Vice NNP , Al Gore who recently picked up an Oscar for his documentary on DT ravages of JJ NN . Speaking to reporters on a visit to Brussels to address a conference on biofuels , Gore VBD a European lead on DT issue was vital . " I 'm trying to VB my country to VB its policies , but in DT meantime DT European Union is absolutely key to helping DT NN make DT NN PRP must , " he VBD . British Prime Minister Tony Blair VBD IN Europe should not only show leadership on combating NN NN , but RB beef up DT security of NN supplies while opening DT market to more competition . " I VBP EX is DT real possibility of showing how Europe can lead DT debate on NN NN , on NN security , and on deregulation in DT interest of a more competitive European economy , " Blair VBD on Tuesday in London . EU leaders are expected to endorse plans to cut carbon dioxide ( CO2 ) NNS by 20 percent by 2020 , from 1990 levels , and by 30 percent if other developed and emerging economies , particularly NNP and India , join them . DT European Union produces about 14 percent of DT NN 's greenhouse gas NNS while DT NNP NNPS , DT NN 's largest polluter , produces some 25 percent . Although DT summit is expected to provide a show of unity , tensions are brewing under DT surface over DT role of nuclear NN and DT use of renewable NN sources . CD of DT liveliest debates is expected on whether to set a binding target of renewable NN sources meeting 20 percent of Europe 's NN needs by 2020 , after foreign ministers failed to reach an agreement on Monday . Environmentalists : " PRP 's not enough " Although Europe is leading efforts to combat NN NN , some environmentalists warned IN DT EU leaders are not aiming high enough . " DT EU 's NN action plan ... will fall a long way short in making Europe 's NN more sustainable unless targets for both renewable share and reducing greenhouse gases are raised and tightened , " VBD Friends of DT NNP NN campaigner Jan Kowalzig . NN policy has climbed to DT top of DT EU political agenda over DT last NN as oil price spikes and cuts in gas and oil supplies from Russia have spurred DT bloc to forge a common strategy to meeting their needs . However , despite DT growing importance attached to NN , DT EU has struggled to hammer out a common approach , with member NNS often putting national interests first , much to DT frustration of DT European Commission . Such is DT case with a European Commission idea to inject greater competition into DT EU NN market with plans to make large , integrated gas and power companies split their generating and distribution networks . Leaders are likely to send DT plan back to DT drawing board with France and to a lesser extent Germany opposed to DT idea , which MD cause a major shake - up of French and German NN groups . DT summit comes amid a shifting European political landscape with Italian Prime Minister Romano Prodi emerging shaken from a recent crisis , British Prime Minister Tony Blair increasingly a lame duck , and looming French presidential elections in April and NNP . PRP will RB be French NNP Jacques Chirac 's last chance to leave his mark on EU policy - making after nearly 12 NNS in office fiercely defending French interests during meetings with EU leaders . Looking ahead as Germany chairs DT Group of Eight industrial nations this NN , Merkel will likely VB to take DT conclusions of this week 's meetings into DT G8 summit in Heiligendamm , Germany in June .

text: DT NN must sharply draw down greenhouse gas NNS and suck billions of tonnes of carbon dioxide from DT air if today 's youth are to be spared NN cataclysm , a top scientist has warned . " DT is a good impulse , because if PRP VBP to 2 C , PRP is guaranteed IN PRP will lose our shorelines and coastal cities , " VBD Hansen . " DT only question is how fast . " NNP 's surface temperature , DT amount of CO2 in DT atmosphere , and NN levels have all changed in lock - step over hundreds of millions of NNS , he pointed out . Even under optimistic scenarios , DT number is projected to rise for decades . " DT last NN in NNP 's history IN CO2 concentrations were at 450 ppm , NN level was 25 metres ( 80 feet ) higher , " he noted . text: In honor of Rolling Stone ’s NNP Crisis Issue , PRP asked artists to contribute messages about what PRP , their governments , and everyday NNS can do to stand up to DT threat of NN NN . From England to Jamaica to DT NNP NNPS , PRP are hearing from artists and activists around DT NN about what PRP can do locally , globally , and everywhere in between . When Annie Leonard , executive director of Greenpeace USA , talks about NN NN , she first talks about community . “ My neighbors and I have a very , very strong sense of community . And DT MD sound corny . ‘ What does DT have to do with NN NN ? ’ But a strong community is VBG to help PRP VB through NN NN , ” she explains . text: DT NN on NNP has been changing since PRP formed 4.5 billion NNS ago . Until recently , natural factors have been DT cause of these changes . Natural influences on DT NN include volcanic eruptions , changes in DT orbit of DT NNP , and shifts in DT NNP 's crust ( known as plate tectonics ) . Over DT past CD million NNS , DT NNP has experienced a series of NN - ages ( ' glacial periods ' ) and warmer periods ( ' interglacial ' ) . Glacial and interglacial periods cycle roughly every 100,000 NNS , caused by changes in NNP 's orbit around DT sun . For DT past few thousand NNS , NNP has been in an interglacial period with a constant temperature . However , since DT Industrial Revolution in DT 1800s , DT JJ temperature has increased at a much faster rate . By burning fossil fuels and changing how PRP use DT land , human activity has quickly become DT leading cause of changes to our NN . How does DT NN system work ? Some gases in DT NNP 's atmosphere trap heat and stop PRP escaping into space . PRP call these ' greenhouse gases ' . These gases act as a VBG blanket around DT NNP , known as DT ' greenhouse effect ' . Greenhouse gases come from both human and natural sources . Gases IN carbon dioxide , methane , and nitrous oxide naturally occur in DT atmosphere . Others , such as chlorofluorocarbons ( CFCs ) , are only produced by human activity . When short - wave radiation from DT sun reaches NNP , most of PRP passes straight through and hits DT surface . DT NNP absorbs most of this radiation and gives off longer - wavelength infrared radiation . DT greenhouse gases absorb some of this infrared radiation , instead of PRP passing straight out into space . DT atmosphere then emits radiation in all directions , sending some of PRP back to DT surface , causing DT NN to heat up . This process is known as DT ' greenhouse effect ' . DT greenhouse effect is critical to our survival . In fact , without greenhouse gases , NNP MD be about 30 degrees colder than PRP is today . Without greenhouse gases and their NN effect , PRP MD n't be able to survive . However , since DT Industrial Revolution , PRP 've been adding more and more greenhouse gases into DT air , trapping even more heat . Instead of keeping NNP at a warm , stable temperature , DT greenhouse effect is heating DT NN at a much faster rate . PRP call this DT ' enhanced greenhouse effect ' and it's DT main cause of NN NN . PRP produce greenhouse gases in lots of different ways : • Burning fossil fuels – Fossil fuels such as oil , gas , and coal contain carbon dioxide WDT has been ' locked away ' in DT ground for thousands of NNS . When PRP take these out of DT land and burn them , PRP release DT stored carbon dioxide into DT air . • Deforestation – Forests remove and store carbon dioxide from DT atmosphere . Cutting them down means IN carbon dioxide builds up quicker since EX are no trees to absorb PRP . Not only DT , trees release DT carbon PRP stored when PRP burn them . • Agriculture – Planting crops and rearing animals releases JJ different types of greenhouse gases into DT air . For example , animals produce methane , which is 30 times more powerful than carbon dioxide as a greenhouse gas . DT nitrous oxide used for fertilisers is ten times worse and is nearly 300 times more potent than carbon dioxide ! • Cement – Producing cement is another contributor to NN NN , causing 2 % of our entire carbon dioxide NNS . Natural changes to DT NN DT leading cause of NN NN is human activity and DT release of greenhouse gases . However , EX are lots of natural causes WDT RB lead to changes in DT NN system . Natural cycles can cause DT NN to alternate between NN and cooling . EX are RB natural factors WDT force DT NN to VB , known as ' forcings ' . Even though these natural causes contribute to NN NN , PRP VBP IN PRP are not DT primary cause , based on scientific evidence . These changes , called Milankovitch cycles , affect DT amount of sunlight WDT falls on NNP . This can cause DT temperature of NNP to VB . However , these cycles take place over tens or hundreds of thousands of NNS and are unlikely to be causing DT changes to DT NN WDT PRP are seeing today . • El Niño Southern Oscillation ( ENSO ) – ENSO is a pattern of changing NN temperatures in DT Pacific Ocean . In an ' El Niño ' NN , DT JJ temperature warms up , and in a ' La Niña ' NN , PRP cools down . These patterns can affect DT JJ temperature for a short amount of NN ( months or NNS ) but cannot explain DT persistent NN WDT PRP see today . What is El Niño , what does PRP mean and how does PRP affect weather around DT NN ? Natural forcings WDT can contribute to NN NN include : • Solar irradiance – Changing NN from DT sun has affected DT temperature of NNP in DT past . However , PRP have not seen anything strong enough to VB our NN . Any increase in solar NN MD make DT entire atmosphere of NNP warm , but PRP can only see NN in DT bottom layer . • Volcanic eruptions – Volcanoes have a mixed effect on our NN . Eruptions produce aerosol particles WDT cool NNP , but PRP RB release carbon dioxide , which warms PRP . Volcanoes produce 50 times less carbon dioxide than humans do , so PRP VBP PRP are not DT leading cause of JJ NN . On top of this , cooling is DT dominant effect of volcanic eruptions , not NN . When looking at all DT evidence , EX is a large scientific consensus IN humans are DT leading cause of NN NN . In their latest report , DT Intergovernmental Panel on NNP NNP stated with over 95 % certainty IN human activity is DT main cause of JJ NN . Natural NN cycles can VB DT temperature of NNP , but DT changes PRP are seeing are happening at a scale and speed IN natural cycles cannot explain . These cycles affect DT JJ temperature for NNS , or sometimes just months , not DT 100 NNS WDT PRP have observed . Meanwhile , longer - term changes IN Milankovitch cycles and solar irradiance take thousands and thousands of NNS . EX are lots of things WDT affect NN NN , but DT evidence is irrefutable .
